column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I went to the River North Lou Malnati's for lunch with a group of friends
column2: and we had a good time dining on their deep dish pizza.  It's a casual
column3: family-friendly and group-friendly restaurant to have Chicago deep dish.  I tried the Chicago Classic with green pepper
column4: and it was delicious.  The House Salad is also good
column5: especially Malnati's own sweet vinaigrette dressing.  The ice cream sundae is good too
column6: particularly the vanilla ice cream.  I only wish the brownie included in the sundae was served hot.
